title: Hackers Exploit AI Tools to Intensify Ransomware Attacks on European Organizations

content.raw: European organizations are facing an unprecedented surge in ransomware attacks as cybercriminals increasingly adopt artificial intelligence and sophisticated social engineering tactics to breach defenses and accelerate their operations. According to the latest CrowdStrike 2025 European Threat Landscape Report, big game hunting ransomware adversaries have named approximately 2,100 European-based victims on more than 100 dedicated leak […] The post Hackers Exploit AI Tools to Intensify Ransomware Attacks on European Organizations appeared first on GBHackers Security | #1 Globally Trusted Cyber Security News Platform.
